original_text: who were building on the wall. Those who carried burdens were loaded in such a way that each labored on the work with one hand and held his weapon with the other.
korean_text: 성을 건축하는 자와 짐을 나르는 자는 다 각각 한 손으로 일을 하며 한 손에는 병기를 잡았는데

sentences.original_text: who were building on the wall.
were loaded in such a way
that each labored on the work with one hand
and held his weapon with the other.
